languages.text: {n}Караэль чуть наклоняет голову.{/n} "С тех пор, как ты был низвергнут... о тебе многое говорят. Многое, что... бросает тень даже на наследников рода Эзирраеш. Не все кабалиты уверены в том, что служение тебе — достойное будущее для Опустошительной бури".

{n}Kharael cocks his head slightly.{/n} "Ever since you were deposed... there has been a lot of talk about you. Much of it... casts shade even on the scions of the Aezyrraesh. Not all Kabalites are convinced that serving you is a worthy future for the Reaving Tempest."
languages.original_text: {n}Караэль чуть наклоняет голову.{/n} "С тех пор, как ты был низвергнут... о тебе многое говорят. Многое, что... бросает тень даже на наследников рода Эзирраеш. Не все кабалиты уверены в том, что служение тебе — достойное будущее для Опустошительной бури".

traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharael legt den Kopf leicht schief.{/n} "Seit Ihr gestürzt wurdet ... wurde viel über Euch gesprochen. Das meiste Gerede ... wirft selbst auf die Nachfahren der Aezyrraesh einen Schatten. Nicht alle Mitglieder der Kabale sind überzeugt, dass es eine würdige Zukunft für den plündernden Sturm darstellt, Euch zu dienen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael cocks his head slightly.{/n} "Ever since you were deposed... there has been a lot of talk about you. Much of it... casts shade even on the scions of the Aezyrraesh. Not all Kabalites are convinced that serving you is a worthy future for the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael legt den Kopf leicht schief.{/n} "Seit Ihr gestürzt wurdet ... wurde viel über Euch gesprochen. Das meiste Gerede ... wirft selbst auf die Nachfahren der Aezyrraesh einen Schatten. Nicht alle Mitglieder der Kabale sind überzeugt, dass es eine würdige Zukunft für den plündernden Sturm darstellt, Euch zu dienen."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}卡瑞尔微微歪了歪头。{/n}“自从你被废黜之后……很多人都在谈论你。大部分人……都不太看好艾泽拉什的后裔。并非所有狂风阴谋团的成员都相信你，他们怀疑就算侍奉你，也未必会给阴谋团带来辉煌的未来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael cocks his head slightly.{/n} "Ever since you were deposed... there has been a lot of talk about you. Much of it... casts shade even on the scions of the Aezyrraesh. Not all Kabalites are convinced that serving you is a worthy future for the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡瑞尔微微歪了歪头。{/n}“自从你被废黜之后……很多人都在谈论你。大部分人……都不太看好艾泽拉什的后裔。并非所有狂风阴谋团的成员都相信你，他们怀疑就算侍奉你，也未必会给阴谋团带来辉煌的未来。”
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharael incline légèrement la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Depuis votre destitution... Beaucoup parlent de vous. Nombreux sont ceux qui critiquent même la famille Aezyrraesh. Certains Kabalites doutent que vous servir soit un avenir digne de la Tempête ravageuse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael cocks his head slightly.{/n} "Ever since you were deposed... there has been a lot of talk about you. Much of it... casts shade even on the scions of the Aezyrraesh. Not all Kabalites are convinced that serving you is a worthy future for the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael incline légèrement la tête sur le côté.{/n} « Depuis votre destitution... Beaucoup parlent de vous. Nombreux sont ceux qui critiquent même la famille Aezyrraesh. Certains Kabalites doutent que vous servir soit un avenir digne de la Tempête ravageuse. »
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharael ladea ligeramente la cabeza.{/n} «Desde que fuiste depuesto... se ha hablado mucho sobre ti. La mayor parte... pone en duda hasta a los herederos de los Aezyrraesh. No todos los Kabalistas creen que servirte sea un futuro digno de la Tempestad Asoladora».
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael cocks his head slightly.{/n} "Ever since you were deposed... there has been a lot of talk about you. Much of it... casts shade even on the scions of the Aezyrraesh. Not all Kabalites are convinced that serving you is a worthy future for the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael ladea ligeramente la cabeza.{/n} «Desde que fuiste depuesto... se ha hablado mucho sobre ti. La mayor parte... pone en duda hasta a los herederos de los Aezyrraesh. No todos los Kabalistas creen que servirte sea un futuro digno de la Tempestad Asoladora».
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}カラエルは微かに首をかしげる。{/n}「あなたが追放されて以来、話題になるのはあなたのことばかりだった。その多くがアエジレシュの末裔にさえ影を落とすようなものだ。あなたに仕えることが略奪の嵐にとって価値ある未来につながると全てのカバライトが思っているわけではない」
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael cocks his head slightly.{/n} "Ever since you were deposed... there has been a lot of talk about you. Much of it... casts shade even on the scions of the Aezyrraesh. Not all Kabalites are convinced that serving you is a worthy future for the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}カラエルは微かに首をかしげる。{/n}「あなたが追放されて以来、話題になるのはあなたのことばかりだった。その多くがアエジレシュの末裔にさえ影を落とすようなものだ。あなたに仕えることが略奪の嵐にとって価値ある未来につながると全てのカバライトが思っているわけではない」
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Kharael, hafifçe başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Azledildiğinden beri hakkında çok şey konuşuldu. Çoğu, Aezyrraesh çocuklarına bile gölge düşüren cinsten şeyler. Kabalistlerin hepsi, sana hizmet etmenin Müfteris Kasırga'nın geleceği adına doğru şey olduğuna ikna olmuş değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael cocks his head slightly.{/n} "Ever since you were deposed... there has been a lot of talk about you. Much of it... casts shade even on the scions of the Aezyrraesh. Not all Kabalites are convinced that serving you is a worthy future for the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael hafifçe başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Görevden alındığından beri senin hakkında çok konuşuldu. Konuşulanların çoğu Aezyrraesh çocuklarına bile gölge düşüren cinstendi. Sana hizmet etmenin Müfteris Kasırga'nın geleceği adına doğru şey olduğuna tüm Kabalistler ikna olmuş değil."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari
